abstract: Review Article Inadequate health resources to tackle affected patients can aggravate Covid-19 pandemic. There were 8.92 million Covid-19 cases, 0.47 million Covid-19 deaths and 4.74 million recovered Covid-19 cases in the world as on June 21, 2020. Using a sample data of 117 countries until June 17, 2020, this study verifies and finds the support for the hypothesis that those inadequate health resources worsens Covid-19 pandemic.
